verses.text: Let \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy throat \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w violated|strong="H5674"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w call|strong="H2199"\w* upon \w me|strong="H3045"\w*: \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, we, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath cast off \w the|strong="H7291"\w* thing \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w the|strong="H7291"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H2091"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w been|strong="H4427"\w* \w princes|strong="H8323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*.

Thy \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*, \w O|strong="H2186"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w is|strong="H0639"\w* cast off, \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*. \w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* incapable \w of|strong="H3808"\w* being cleansed?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w itself|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* invention \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w a|strong="H1961"\w* workman \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* spidersâ€™ webs.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* whirlwind, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w* stalk \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bud \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w yield|strong="H1097"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*; \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w yield|strong="H1097"\w*, \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* eat \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*: \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* unclean \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* ass \w alone|strong="H0909"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* himself: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* hath given gifts \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0158"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w hired|strong="H8566"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H2490"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* rest \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w while|strong="H4592"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* hath \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*: \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

I \w shall|strong="H8451"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H3644"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* manifold \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, which \w have|strong="H8451"\w* \w been|strong="H3644"\w* \w accounted|strong="H2803"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w foreign|strong="H2114"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* victims, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w receive|strong="H2403"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* Maker, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w temples|strong="H1964"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Juda hath \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* fenced \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w upon|strong="H0784"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* houses thereof.
